name: geoserver-in-action-ws
description: The materials for the geoserver-in-action workshop

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run doc:build && npm run doc:pdf && npm run doc:epub && cd build/geoserver-in-action-ws
scripts.archive: npm run build && cd build && zip -x geoserver-in-action-ws/materials/* -r geoserver-in-action-ws.zip geoserver-in-action-ws geoserver-in-action-ws_*.pdf geoserver-in-action-ws_*.epub

author: terrestris GmbH & Co. KG
